mst06.name: msg_system
mst06.message: Please choose a device to\nsave and load data.
Accessing contents.\nDo not switch off the console.
Saving game data. \nPlease don't turn off your console.
Could not find "Sonic The Hedgehog" file.\nDo you want to create a new "Sonic The\nHedgehog" file?
If you end the game, you will lose your game\nprogress from your last save up to this point.\nAre you sure you want to end the game?
Please connect a controller,\nand press the $ button.
Please connect a wireless controller,\nand press the $ button.
Now saving. Do not switch off the power \nwhile the HDD access indicator is flashing.
Save data up to this point?
Cleared the Sonic The Hedgehog Episode!
Cleared the Shadow The Hedgehog Episode!
Cleared the Silver The Hedgehog Episode!
Cleared all ACT Missions in the\nSonic Episode with Rank S!
Cleared all ACT Missions in the\nShadow Episode with Rank S!
Cleared all ACT Missions in the\nSilver Episode with Rank S!
Cleared all Town Missions in the\nSonic Episode with Rank S!
Cleared all Town Missions in the\nShadow Episode with Rank S!
Cleared all Town Missions in the\nSilver Episode with Rank S!
Collected all Silver Medals in the Sonic Episode!
Collected all Silver Medals in the Shadow Episode!
Collected all Silver Medals in the Silver Episode!
Shadow Episode is now unlocked.\nPlease select the Episode from Single Player.
Silver Episode is now unlocked.\nPlease select the Episode from Single Player.
Last Episode is now unlocked.\nPlease select the Episode from Single Player.
Cleared all ACT Missions in the\nLast Episode with Rank S!
Movie Theater is now unlocked.\nPlease select Movie Theater from Extras.
Congratulations!\nYou have collected all Gold Medals!
You have collected all Gold Medals!
You have collected all Silver Medals!
Congratulations!\nYou have collected all Silver Medals!
Cleared all Town Missions with Rank S!
Collected all Silver Medals in TOWN Stage!
Collected 10 Silver Medals in ACT Stage!
Cleared ACT Mission with Rank S!
Music from Sonic Episode is now\navailable in Audio Room.
Music from Shadow Episode is now\navailable in Audio Room.
Music from Silver Episode is now\navailable in Audio Room.
Music from Last Episode is now\navailable in Audio Room.
Sonic Episode is now \navailable in Theater Room.
Shadow Episode is now\navailable in Theater Room.
Silver Episode is now \navailable in Theater Room.
Last Episode is now \navailable in Theater Room.
You can now watch Sonic Episode\nin Theater Room.
You can now watch Shadow Episode\nin Theater Room.
You can now watch Silver Episode\nin Theater Room.
You cannot use this gamer profile.
There are not enough free blocks to create\nSave Data. You need to free at least $MB.
There is no Save Data for Sonic The Hedgehog.\nDo you want to create a new Save Data?
Load failed. The Save Data cannot be loaded.\nWould you like to create a new Save Data?
Save Data has been created.\nPlease press $ to continue.
Deleting...\nPlease do not switch off Xbox 360 console.
Saving...\nPlease do not switch off Xbox 360 console.
Creating Save Data.\nPlease do not switch off Xbox 360 console.
Creating Save Data.\nPlease do not switch off Xbox 360 console.
Accessing hard disc.\nPlease do not switch off Xbox 360 console.
Checking contents of Memory Stick™\nPlease do not remove the Memory Stick™,\nreset the console, or turn off the power.
The Memory Stick™ in slot 1 is not formatted.
The Memory Stick™ in slot 1 is not formatted.\nFormat the Memory Stick™ in Memory Stick™\nslot?

Now formatting the Memory Stick™ in
Memory Stick™ slot. Please do not
remove the Memory Stick™,
reset the console, or turn off the power.
Memory Stick™ error.\nPlease check the Memory\nStick™ in Memory Stick™ slot.
There is no Memory Stick™ in Memory Stick™\nslot. Please insert a Memory Stick™ in\nMemory Stick™ slot.

There is insufficient space on the
Memory Stick™ in Memory Stick™ slot.
This game requires $KB of free space
to save data.
If you begin the game, you will not be able\nto save later. Is this okay?
The Memory Stick™ in Memory Stick™ slot\nis damaged and cannot be used.\nPlease insert a useable Memory Stick™.
Format failed.\nPlease check the Memory Stick™ \nin Memory Stick™ slot and try again.
Could not connect to Xbox Live.
Please check your Xbox Live settings.
Connecting to Xbox Live.\nPlease do not turn the power off.
Connecting to network.\nPlease do not turn the power off.
Reach the goal before your opponent!
You have already reached the maximum\nnumber of Save Data files.
Please delete old Save Data if you wish\nto save new data.
There is insufficient space on HDD.\nThis game requires $MB of free data.
There is insufficient space on HDD.\nThis game requires
The HDD access indicator will blink during data\nsave. Please do not turn the power off.
Game data is corrupted. Please quit the\ngame and delete your game data.
Cannot proceed with game.\nReturning to Title Screen.
Cannot proceed with game.\nGame progression halted.
A communication error has occurred.\nCannot connect to PLAYSTATION®Network.
A communication error has occurred.\nCannot connect to PLAYSTATION®Network.
Could not sign in to PLAYSTATION®Network.
Please insert the SONIC THE HEDGEHOG\ngame disk.
Saved Data will be overwritten.\nIs this okay?
Attack surrounding enemies by stirring up a whirlwind
Slows time down in the immediate vicinity
Come to a midair stop and then attack with a Homing Dash
Teleport to where you have tossed the gem
Protects against enemy attacks and pulls in Rings
Sonic transforms into a larger size
Overwrite the Save Data.\nIf you overwrite you will lose the previously\nsaved data. OK?
You need to select a storage device to\nsave the game data. Please select a \nstorage device you wish to use.

The storage device has been removed. 
You need a storage device to save the 
game data. Please select a storage 
device you wish to use.

There is not enough space to save in 
the storage device you selected. You might
not be able to save to this storage device. 
Please select a storage device you wish to use.
You have not signed in to the gamer profile. \nIf you continue the game you will not be able to\nsave game data. Do you want to sign in?
You have not signed in to the gamer profile. \nIf you continue you will not be able to save the\ngame data. OK?
No Save Data exists. You need to create\nSave Data to save game data. Do you want to \ncreate new Save Data?
Please re-insert Xbox 360 controller and\npress $ button.
Please re-insert Xbox 360 controller and\npress $ button.
You are not currently signed in.\nIf you do not sign in, you cannot\nsave your game data.
You are not signed in.\nYou cannot save your game\nunless you are signed in.
You need to sign in to play\nXbox Live.
Your sign-in status has changed. \nThe game cannot be continued. \nReturning to the Title Screen.
No storage device selected. \nYou will not be able to save. \nContinue without saving?
No storage device selected. \nYou will not be able to load. \nContinue without loading?
Finish saving and return to the game?

There is not enough free space to create Save
Data. At least $KB free space is required to 
create Save Data. Please check the free space 
in the storage device and try again.
This gamer profile is only viewable to Friends.
This gamer profile is not viewable.
Exit the game and go back to the Title Screen.\nThe progress of the game from the last saved\npoint will not be saved. OK?
Exit the game.\nThe progress of the game from the last saved\npoint will not be saved. OK?
Exit the game and go back to the Title Screen.\nThe progress of the game from the last saved\npoint will not be saved. OK?
Exit the game.\nThe progress of the game from the last saved\npoint will not be saved. OK?
Go back to the Title Screen.\nOK?
Go back to the Title Screen.\nThe progress of the game from the last saved\npoint will not be saved. OK?
Go back to the Title Screen.\nThe progress of the game from the last saved\npoint will not be saved. OK?
Load failed. Game data cannot be loaded.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save\nthe progress of the game.
Save failed. Game data cannot be saved. \nIf you continue you will not be able to save\nthe progress of the game.
Failed to access to the Save Data.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save \nthe Same Data.
Load failed. Same Data cannot be loaded.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save \nSave Data. Is this OK?
Save failed. Save Data cannot be saved.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save\nSave Data. Is this OK?
Access to Save Data failed. If you continue\nyou will not be able to save Save Data.\nIs this OK?

Load failed. 
Save Data cannot be loaded.
If you continue you will not be able to save 
the progress of the game. Is this OK?
Save failed. Save Data cannot be saved.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save\nthe progress of the game. Is this OK?
Access to Save Data failed. If you continue\nyou will not be able to save the progress of\nthe game. Is this OK?
You have signed out your gamer profile. \nAll of your unsaved progress has been lost.\nYou will be returned to the Title Screen.
You cannot continue the game.\nYou will be returned to the Title Screen.

The game data may be damaged and cannot
be loaded. Do you want to create new 
game data? This will overwrite previously 
saved game data.

The Save Data may be damaged and 
cannot be loaded. Do you want to create
new Save Data? This will overwrite previously
saved Save Data.
Go back to the Title Screen without\nloading.
Load failed. Game data cannot be loaded.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save\nthe progress of the game.
Load failed. Save data cannot be loaded.\nIf you continue you will not be able to save\nthe progress of the game.
Saving... HDD access indicator blinks while \nsaving. Please do not switch off the console \nwhile HDD access indicator is blinking.
Loading... HDD access indicator blinks while\nloading. Please do not switch off the console \nwhile the HDD access indicator is blinking
Creating Save Data in HDD. HDD access indicator\nblinks while creating. Please do not switch off \nthe console while HDD access indicator is blinking.
There is not enough space to create Save Data.\n$ KB is required to create Save Data. \nDo you want to create space in HDD?
There is no Save Data found in HDD. \nDo you want to create new Save Data in HDD?
Get to the goal within $ minutes!
Get to the goal within $ minutes!
Get to the goal before your rival!
Get to the goal before the ghost!
Get to the new Goal Ring!
Collect the Chaos Emeralds and save Sonic!
Defeat Dr. Eggman and save Elise!
Find out where Dr. Eggman's battleship went!
Get Lord Regis' approval, and go to the desert!
Head for the tunnel to the desert!
Get a pass for the tunnel!
Take Elise, and head for the castle!
Meet Knuckles in the warehouse district!
Head for the altar in the Castle Town!
Head for the old Soleanna castle!
From the royal seal, go to the old castle's entry!
Head for Dr. Eggman's secret base!
Head for the extraction point at the old castle!
From the forest, head for Soleanna's old castle!
Light dash across the broken bridge!
Find the glider hidden in the woods!
Destroy the rock blocking the cave!
Use the glider to head to the old castle's entry!
Meet up with Rouge in the warehouse district!
Collect information on the Scepter of Darkness!
Find archaeologists in the castle town!
Solve the puzzle of the dark candlestick!
Go to the headquarters building in the new city!
Head for the tunnel leading to the desert!
Hurry to Iblis, the Flames of Disaster!
Find the person Amy's looking for!
Find Lord Regis to get a pass to the desert!
Find Lord Regis in the forest!
Escape and get to the castle!
From the royal seal, go to the old castle's entry!
